TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowInteropHelper extends System.Object

summary.span: Assists interoperation between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Win32 code.

span.span: Assists interoperation between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Win32 code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的成员允许调用方具有内部访问权限[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]HWND 和父 HWND 的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。Members of this class allows the caller to have internal access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND and the parent HWND of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] . 通过这些成员进行适当的安全检查。The proper security checks are performed by those members. 需要一个更具体的对象，该对象基于其 HWND 时，请使用此类。Use this class whenever you need a more specific object based on its HWND. 示例方案是如果您需要承载[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]对话框中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]应用程序。An example scenario is if you need to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. 初始化与[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]对话框中的窗口对象。Initialize the with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window object for the dialog box. 然后就可以获取[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]窗口的句柄 (HWND) 从属性，并指定为所有者[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有窗口属性。You can then get the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window's handle (HWND) from the property and specify the owner for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window with the property. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用承载时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中的对话框[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]应用程序。The following code example shows how to use when hosting a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#windowinterophelper)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#windowinterophelper)] 此类支持的另一种情况是获得对象从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]对象。Another scenario supported by this class is to obtain a object from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] object. 使你能够直接处理[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]消息方法。The enables direct processing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] messages through the method. 通过使用并来代替仍可以处理没有等效项或处理中的消息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。By using and in place of a you can still handle messages that have no equivalent or handling in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 创建与来源，然后调用上若要从 HWND 到获取。Create a with the source, then call on the to get from HWND to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该窗口可以是一个对话框或处于不适合的边界内承载的窗口[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]应用程序。The window can be a dialog box, or a window that is otherwise not suitable for being hosted within the bounds of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int EnsureHandle() cil managed

summary.span: Creates the HWND of the window if the HWND has not been created yet.

span.span: Creates the HWND of the window if the HWND has not been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法时您想要单独的窗口句柄 (HWND) 创建与实际显示的托管。Use the method when you want to separate window handle (HWND) creation from the actual showing of the managed . 当有可以完成其任务而无需显示一个窗口的自动化客户端时，这很有用。This is useful when you have an automation client that can accomplish its tasks without the need for showing a window. 如果尚未创建本机窗口，此方法将创建本机窗口集属性，并返回 HWND。If the native window has not yet been created, this method creates the native window, sets the property, and returns the HWND. 如果已创建本机窗口，则返回现有的本机窗口的句柄。If the native window has been created already, the handle of the existing native window is returned. 如果通过调用此方法创建的本机窗口引发事件。If the native window is created as a result of calling this method, the event is raised. 查询属性后的调用方法将返回现有的窗口句柄。Querying the property after the method is called returns the existing window handle. 可视化树未连接到后的窗口之前调用方法。The visual tree is not attached to the window until after the method is called. 调用方法不止一次不会创建新的窗口句柄。Calling the method more than one time does not create new window handles. 调用方法创建句柄后通过调用方法不会创建新的窗口句柄。Calling the method when the handle has already been created by a call to the method does not create a new window handle. 不存在句柄时才创建本机窗口时调用方法。A native window is only created when no handle exists when the method is called. 窗口通过 p/invoke 的本机窗口 Api 设置的属性可能不会显示在托管窗口的 Api。Window properties that are set by using native window APIs via p/invoke may not appear in the managed window APIs. 例如，如果您设置窗口使用本机 MS_EX_TOPMOST 标志后的为最顶层调用方法时，属性不一定反映本机的设置。For example, if you set the window to be topmost by using the native MS_EX_TOPMOST flag after the method is called, the property is not guaranteed to reflect the native setting.

permission.span: 若要创建和访问窗口句柄。

span.span: to create and access a window handle.

summary.span: Gets the window handle for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window that is used to create this .

span.span: Gets the window handle for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window that is used to create this .

member this.Owner : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] owner window.

span.span: Gets or sets the handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] owner window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置此属性，重新设置父级 windows。You can reparent windows by setting this property. 按原样，则返回 true 的常规[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]编程详细信息，请执行不重新设置父级已在使用的 windows。As is true for general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, do not reparent windows that are already in use.

permission.span: 获取或设置此属性的值。

span.span: to get or set this property value.
